headline: Scotiabank Raises CVX Target to $168 in U.S. Integrated Oil and E&P Update
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is included among the 15 Best High Yield Stocks to Buy. On January 16, Scotiabank raised its price target on Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) to $168 from $165. The firm maintained a Sector Perform rating on the stock. The bank said the change is part of a wider update to its coverage across […]

headline: Technicals Point to Buying Opportunity for Former Stock Picks
summary: As markets rotate toward value, many of the old favorites investors once overlooked are quietly setting up as opportunities.  Stocks that lagged the tech-driven rally of the past few years are showing constructive technical patterns and attractive relative strength, offering a second look from our picks last year.  With the broader market favoring sectors like energy, industrials, and consumer staples, revisiting these prior picks can reveal opportunities where patience and timing may be rewarded.

content.title: Technicals Point to Buying Opportunity for Former Stock Picks
content.summary: As markets rotate toward value, many of the old favorites investors once overlooked are quietly setting up as opportunities.  Stocks that lagged the tech-driven rally of the past few years are showing constructive technical patterns and attractive relative strength, offering a second look from our picks last year.  With the broader market favoring sectors like energy, industrials, and consumer staples, revisiting these prior picks can reveal opportunities where patience and timing may be rewarded.

headline: Chevron (CVX) Valuation Check After Leviathan Expansion, Venezuela Progress And Post Hess Merger Upgrades
summary: Recent headlines around Chevron (CVX) have centered on its Final Investment Decision to expand the Leviathan offshore gas field, a potential broader license in Venezuela, and fresh analyst attention after completing the Hess merger. See our latest analysis for Chevron. The recent Leviathan expansion decision, Venezuela license progress, and completion of the Hess deal have coincided with a 30 day share price return of 11.3% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 11.5%. This suggests...

headline: Change in Venezuela Isn’t the Only Reason to Own Oil-Field-Services Stocks
summary: Oil-field-services giants have been among the biggest gainers in the energy universe since Maduro’s capture:  SLB  and  Halliburton’s  shares have appreciated 21% and 13%, respectively, outpacing the 6.8% gain for an ETF tracking large oil-and-gas-sector companies.  This is especially true for Halliburton, whose business depends more heavily on the short-cycle shale producers in the U.S. that are more reactive to oil prices.  Halliburton on its earnings call on Wednesday said that revenue in North America fell 6% in 2025; it expects another high-single-digit percentage decline in 2026.

content.title: Change in Venezuela Isn’t the Only Reason to Own Oil-Field-Services Stocks
content.summary: Oil-field-services giants have been among the biggest gainers in the energy universe since Maduro’s capture:  SLB  and  Halliburton’s  shares have appreciated 21% and 13%, respectively, outpacing the 6.8% gain for an ETF tracking large oil-and-gas-sector companies.  This is especially true for Halliburton, whose business depends more heavily on the short-cycle shale producers in the U.S. that are more reactive to oil prices.  Halliburton on its earnings call on Wednesday said that revenue in North America fell 6% in 2025; it expects another high-single-digit percentage decline in 2026.

headline: This Week In Energy Transition - Saudi Solar Growth Powers Vision 2030 Transition
summary: The Saudi Arabian solar energy market is poised for significant expansion, with projections indicating growth from 10.25 gigawatts (GW) in 2025 to 13.47 GW in 2026, and ultimately reaching an estimated 52.72 GW by 2031. This progress is fueled by the country's increasing demand for renewable energy in line with Vision 2030, aiming to shift from hydrocarbons to clean energy sources. The streamlined Renewable Energy Project Development Office (REPDO) tender process has been a pivotal driver,...
